title: My Daily Phrase German - Promo
description: My Daily Phrase German is a daily podcast which will introduce listeners to the German language day by day, step by step, phrase by phrase. If you've not yet finalised your New Year Resolutions then why not decide to learn a language?
content:encoded: My Daily Phrase German is a daily podcast which will introduce listeners to the German language day by day, step by step, phrase by phrase. If you've not yet finalised your New Year Resolutions then why not decide to learn a language?
itunes:subtitle: Learn German day by day, step by step, phrase by phrase
